definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: near Bethel, [[אל־הַבּׂכִים]] Ju Jdg 2:1, [[בּׂכִים]] v:Jdg 2:5 (cf. v:Jdg 2:4); LXX Jdg 2:1 to\n Klauqmw=na kai\ e)pi\ Baiqhl; v:Jdg 2:5 Klauqmw=nev i.e. [[בְּכָּ יִם]] (LXXL Klauqmw/n);—on poss. connex. with [[אַלּוֹן בָּכוּת]] Ge 35:8 cf. Stu & We:Bleek's Einl. ed. 4, 183, Comp. Hex. 1889, 215; but perh. rd. [[ביתאל]] instead of [[בכים]] in v:Ge 35:1, cf. We Bu:RS 20.
